content.content:
1‚Üíimport * as React from "react"
     2‚Üíimport { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
     3‚Üíimport { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
     4‚Üí
     5‚Üíimport { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üíconst buttonVariants = cva(
     8‚Üí  "inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg:not([class*='size-'])]:size-4 shrink-0 [&_svg]:shrink-0 outline-none focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 focus-visible:ring-[3px] aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive",
     9‚Üí  {
    10‚Üí    variants: {
    11‚Üí      variant: {
    12‚Üí        default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90",
    13‚Üí        destructive:
    14‚Üí          "bg-destructive text-white hover:bg-destructive/90 focus-visible:ring-destructive/20 dark:focus-visible:ring-destructive/40 dark:bg-destructive/60",
    15‚Üí        outline:
    16‚Üí          "border bg-background shadow-xs hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground dark:bg-input/30 dark:border-input dark:hover:bg-input/50",
    17‚Üí        secondary:
    18‚Üí          "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80",
    19‚Üí        ghost:
    20‚Üí          "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground dark:hover:bg-accent/50",
    21‚Üí        link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline",
    22‚Üí      },
    23‚Üí      size: {
    24‚Üí        default: "h-9 px-4 py-2 has-[>svg]:px-3",
    25‚Üí        sm: "h-8 rounded-md gap-1.5 px-3 has-[>svg]:px-2.5",
    26‚Üí        lg: "h-10 rounded-md px-6 has-[>svg]:px-4",
    27‚Üí        icon: "size-9",
    28‚Üí        "icon-sm": "size-8",
    29‚Üí        "icon-lg": "size-10",
    30‚Üí      },
    31‚Üí    },
    32‚Üí    defaultVariants: {
    33‚Üí      variant: "default",
    34‚Üí      size: "default",
    35‚Üí    },
    36‚Üí  }
    37‚Üí)
    38‚Üí
    39‚Üífunction Button({
    40‚Üí  className,
    41‚Üí  variant,
    42‚Üí  size,
    43‚Üí  asChild = false,
    44‚Üí  ...props
    45‚Üí}: React.ComponentProps<"button"> &
    46‚Üí  VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> & {
    47‚Üí    asChild?: boolean
    48‚Üí  }) {
    49‚Üí  const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
    50‚Üí
    51‚Üí  return (
    52‚Üí    <Comp
    53‚Üí      data-slot="button"
    54‚Üí      className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
    55‚Üí      {...props}
    56‚Üí    />
    57‚Üí  )
    58‚Üí}
    59‚Üí
    60‚Üíexport { Button, buttonVariants }
    61‚Üí

1‚Üí"use client"
     2‚Üí
     3‚Üíimport * as React from "react"
     4‚Üíimport * as CheckboxPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-checkbox"
     5‚Üíimport { CheckIcon } from "lucide-react"
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üíimport { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
     8‚Üí
     9‚Üífunction Checkbox({
    10‚Üí  className,
    11‚Üí  ...props
    12‚Üí}: React.ComponentProps<typeof CheckboxPrimitive.Root>) {
    13‚Üí  return (
    14‚Üí    <CheckboxPrimitive.Root
    15‚Üí      data-slot="checkbox"
    16‚Üí      className={cn(
    17‚Üí        "peer border-input dark:bg-input/30 data-[state=checked]:bg-primary data-[state=checked]:text-primary-foreground dark:data-[state=checked]:bg-primary data-[state=checked]:border-primary focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive size-4 shrink-0 rounded-[4px] border shadow-xs transition-shadow outline-none focus-visible:ring-[3px] disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50",
    18‚Üí        className
    19‚Üí      )}
    20‚Üí      {...props}
    21‚Üí    >
    22‚Üí      <CheckboxPrimitive.Indicator
    23‚Üí        data-slot="checkbox-indicator"
    24‚Üí        className="grid place-content-center text-current transition-none"
    25‚Üí      >
    26‚Üí        <CheckIcon className="size-3.5" />
    27‚Üí      </CheckboxPrimitive.Indicator>
    28‚Üí    </CheckboxPrimitive.Root>
    29‚Üí  )
    30‚Üí}
    31‚Üí
    32‚Üíexport { Checkbox }
    33‚Üí

1‚Üíimport * as React from "react"
     2‚Üíimport * as ProgressPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-progress"
     3‚Üí
     4‚Üíimport { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
     5‚Üí
     6‚Üífunction Progress({
     7‚Üí  className,
     8‚Üí  value,
     9‚Üí  ...props
    10‚Üí}: React.ComponentProps<typeof ProgressPrimitive.Root>) {
    11‚Üí  return (
    12‚Üí    <ProgressPrimitive.Root
    13‚Üí      data-slot="progress"
    14‚Üí      className={cn(
    15‚Üí        "bg-primary/20 relative h-2 w-full overflow-hidden rounded-full",
    16‚Üí        className
    17‚Üí      )}
    18‚Üí      {...props}
    19‚Üí    >
    20‚Üí      <ProgressPrimitive.Indicator
    21‚Üí        data-slot="progress-indicator"
    22‚Üí        className="bg-primary h-full w-full flex-1 transition-all"
    23‚Üí        style={{ transform: `translateX(-${100 - (value || 0)}%)` }}
    24‚Üí      />
    25‚Üí    </ProgressPrimitive.Root>
    26‚Üí  )
    27‚Üí}
    28‚Üí
    29‚Üíexport { Progress }
    30‚Üí

content.text:
I have a good understanding of the project structure. The pages folder doesn't exist, so I need to create it. Let me design a beautiful habit tracker with a fresh, motivating design system.

**Design Inspiration:** Modern habit tracker apps like Habitify, Streaks, and Productive with:
- Vibrant gradient accents for motivation
- Satisfying check-off animations
- Streak counters with flame/fire theme
- Weekly calendar view
- Progress indicators
